entities.name: bagman
entities.description: The Bagman business is a topic of discussion and controversy.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is accused by Bill of doing a cover-up regarding the Bagman business.

entities.name: goblins
entities.description: Goblins are mentioned as being involved in the Bagman business, but it's unclear what their role is.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is one of the people discussing the Bagman business and accusing the Ministry of a cover-up.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is laughing along with the others at Mundungus's story.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is also laughing and enjoying the story.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is laughing so hard he's slumping forward on to the table.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is telling a story about his business dealings with Will, including selling him back his own stolen toads for twice the price.

entities.name: will
entities.description: Will is the person who bought the toads from Mundungus and then had them stolen, leading to a comedic exchange between him and Mundungus.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is interrupting the story to tell Mundungus that they don't need to hear any more about his business dealings.

relationships.description: Bill accuses the Ministry of doing a cover-up regarding the Bagman business.
Mundungus sold toads to Will, who then had them stolen and bought them back from Mundungus for twice the price.
This is the inverse relationship of seller_buyer, where Will buys toads back from Mundungus for twice the price.
